channel.title: I believe in a better world and contribute to it as best I can on Tany Minds
channel.description: Recent content in I believe in a better world and contribute to it as best I can on Tany Minds

item.title: Saving the animals’ Christmas: Enchanted Candy Cane
item.description: This story is about three brave friends, who had the courage to save the animals’ Christmas. They had a journey with many twists and turns. They made new friends along the way and celebrated Christmas in the magical forest.

item.title: Tricking Santa | The Mysterious Attic | Tammy & Bobby’s Adventures
item.description: This Christmas story book is about two children Tammy & Bobby who wanted to play a trick on Santa Claus, but discovered the pleasure of giving and being kind.

item.title: Twinky the Christmas tree comes to life: Tammy and Bobby’s New Adventure
item.description: This Christmas book is about an artificial Christmas tree turning 40, about Tammy and Bobby who understand that 40 Christmas trees have been saved over the years, about the Cradle in love with the Broken Pot and more.
